The Chaser

Rank: 302


A disgraced ex-policeman who runs a small ring of prostitutes finds himself in a race against time when one of his women goes missing.


Director: Na Hong-jin

Writer: Na Hong,jin, Shinho Lee, Hong Won,chan

Stars: Kim Yoon,seok, Ha Jung,woo, Seo Young,hee

Tags: Dark Comedy, Tragedy, True Crime, Action, Crime, Drama, Thriller
